fs.xml
Class XMLToolbox

java.lang.Object
  fs.xml.XMLToolbox

public class XMLToolbox
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a variety of useful static functions that implement certain frequently used XML operations in a standard way. It can not be instantiated.

Author:
Simon Hampe

XMLToolbox

public XMLToolbox()
Method Detail

validateXML

public static void validateXML(java.io.File xmlFile,
                               java.io.File schemaFile)
                        throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                               java.io.IOException
This validates an xml file according to a scheme file with the standard java SAX parser and validation implementations

Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - - if either the schema file can't be parsed or a SAX Error occured during parsing of the actual document
java.io.IOException - - if an I/O-error occured while reading the xml file

validateXML

public static void validateXML(javax.xml.transform.Source xmlSource,
                               javax.xml.validation.Schema scheme)
                        throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                               java.io.IOException
This validates an xml source according to a scheme using the standard java SAX parser and validation implementations

Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - - if a SAX Error occured during parsing of the actual document
java.io.IOException - - if an I/O-error occured while reading the xml file

validateXML

public static void validateXML(org.dom4j.Node n,
                               javax.xml.validation.Schema scheme)
                        throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                               java.io.IOException
This validates an already existent XML node according to a scheme using the standard java SAX parser and validation implementations. This is rather inefficient since the document has to be converted in a character stream of XML code that will be read by the validator.

Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException - - if a SAX Error occured during parsing of the actual document
java.io.IOException - - if an I/O-error occured while reading the xml source

getSchemaObject

public static javax.xml.validation.Schema getSchemaObject(java.io.File schemaFile)
                                                   throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                          java.io.IOException
Constructs a Schema object from a given XML file

Throws:
java.io.IOException - - if an I/O-Error occured while reading the file
org.xml.sax.SAXException - - if the file is not a valid schema file

saveXML

public static void saveXML(org.dom4j.Document doc,
                           java.lang.String filename)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Tries to save an org.dom4j.Document object in the specified file in the standard "pretty format".

Throws:
java.io.IOException - - if an I/O-error occured during saving

loadXMLFile

public static org.dom4j.Document loadXMLFile(java.io.File templateFile)
                                      throws org.dom4j.DocumentException
Tries to open the specified XML file. If succesful, it will be stored in a Document object and returned

Throws:
org.dom4j.DocumentException - - If the XML file can not be opened or is not a valid XML file

getDocumentAsPrettyString

public static java.lang.String getDocumentAsPrettyString(org.dom4j.Document doc)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
Returns a document written in the standard 'pretty format' of dom4j

Throws:
java.io.IOException
